DOC.brief_summary: The study aimed at evaluating whether current 24 weeks length of combination treatment is appropriate or not for patients with HCV genotype 3 infection.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study of New Therapeutic Schedules in Naive Hepatitis C Virus (HCV) Patients Infected With Genotype 3 (HCV-3)
DOC.detailed_description: Patients are randomized to standard length of treatment or to a variable duration: 12 weeks for patients with undetectable HCVRNA at week 4 or 24 or 36 weeks for those with detectable HCV RNA at week 4.
DOC.criteria: Naive HCV patients HCVRNA positive Normal TSH ANA <1:160 Portal hypertension Renal failure HBsAg or HIV Alcohol consumption >30 g/day Active IV drug use Chronic systemic diseases
